attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: The quality of the app was terrible. It was glitching on my iPhone which is only a year old!! Definitely won’t recommend the app to others.

attributes.title: Horribly done
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took an hour to download, and the fact that it’s not clear, and confusing is not helpful. I had to delete right away. DO NOT GET!

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to be gifted a ton of money because this man has a lot of it right? WRONG! My dog died right after I opened it and now I can’t go outside. This app ruined my life. Thanks trump. Real cool man.

attributes.title: Awful!!
attributes.review: Full of misinformation, sounds more like a cult leader than a President. This man is a fascist, a racist, a rapist, a white supremacist, and would rather watch the people he swore to protect die from a global disease than acknowledge the severity of the situation. Has no place in this App Store!

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: I can’t figure out how to get it work I wanted to stay updated on great America but even with all four bars of WiFi it must have a bug or something

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
This app is the most disgusting racist app I have ever seen I can not believe Apple has not taken it down. I never want to see this disgusting thing on the App Store again!

✨Oh to see without my eyes✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Please don’t download this it’s a horrible app it say you should vote for trump and that’s false information if you do download this app I suggest you give a 1 star on my opinion and it kept on showing be a orange 🍊

attributes.title: I died issuing this app😳😭😭😫😤😭😖😣😫😤😤😢😱😰😨😨😨🤮
attributes.review: So I download this app to support our great. President when I saw this bigorange man🤢😱😡🥵then I got an email saying my bank account was hacked and that my search history got brought back up and then I died😤🥳😡😕😭😖😖😫😖😖😩😖😖😫

attributes.title: just not good
attributes.review: So desperate for votes that he has to have an app too? I can say right now that it’s very poor craftsmanship and does exactly what is expected of the administration. Setting itself up to fail!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app took over 20 minutes to load and when I got it it lagged my whole phone and have to buy a new one soon terrible app don’t ever download it
